name: Compliance Control
description:
Our company was founded in 2012 by a team of experts with many years of experience in the field of secure payment solutions.
Compliance Control is a Qualified Security Assessor (QSA). Thus, we are entitled to conduct PCI DSS compliance certification audits. Please, refer to detailed information on the official Â PCI SSC website.
Our company has been among the first few in the world (and the first Russian-speaking company) since it was qualified for VISA PIN Security audits in February 2014.
Thus, we are one of the few Ukrainian companies that can offer a comprehensive PCI DSS and PCI PIN Security audit without engagement of any third parties.
